# Aerial Dispatch (Spell)

[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]
**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]
**BoXM: [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]**
**Casting Time:** 1 swift action
**Components:** V
**Range:** Touch
**Target:** Creature touched
**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)
**Saving Throw:** None
**Spell Resistance:** No
**Source:** The Living Sky, pg. xxx

The target of this spell becomes quicker and more maneuverable while airborne. Its fly speed increases by 30 feet, and its maneuverability when flying improves by one category, to a maximum of perfect . While airborne, the target gains a +1 dodge bonus to Armor Class and on Reflex saves.
